data.eml:eml: A new genus and species of myrmecophile clearwing moth (Lepidoptera: Sesiidae) from East Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Agassiz, David, Kallies, Axel (2018): A new genus and species of myrmecophile clearwing moth (Lepidoptera: Sesiidae) from East Africa. Zootaxa 4392 (3): 588-594, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4392.3.8
